page.title: 03The Alsager Library
page.content: Alsager library was opened 2nd October 1970.Approximately 7695 people use the library which covers an area of 6000 sq.feet.There are approximately 30000 books in the library and new books can always be ordered.Recently a computer_ ised system was installed and the 15 people who work there prefer it.As well as books there are adult educat_ ion classes,theatre rehearsals,weight watchers,exhibitions,chess classes, story sessions,yoga,community informa_ tion,films and a very popular job centre to name but a few.Of the 40 people we interviewed,37 lived in Alsager and said it was well situated. Most people visited the library weekly and the average number of books taken out was 3.The majority said that they thought there was a good choice of books.
